pages.text: $(li)Puff Bugs are tiny neutral creatures that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:creatures/the_endergetic_expansion/poise_forest)Poise Forests$(/l) of the End.$(br)$(li)When they find an unpollinated Bolloom Bud, they will polizate it and obtain the Levitation effect for a few minutes.$(br)$(li)After that, if you give a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/endergetic/bolloom_fruit)Bolloom Fruit$(/l) to a Puff Bug, it will drop a Baloom Bud.
Puff Bugs can be breed, you only have to give them $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/endergetic/tall_poise_bush)Tall Poise Bush$(/l).
